resources.string: The number must be between 1 and 8

If this setting is enabled, every time the accessibility service gets started (a situation that also occurs when the device is booted), the number of notes to be played will be set to the value in the box below; also the device will be locked automatically.\n\nIf this setting is disabled, every time the accessibility service is started, it will only start the main service.

If this setting is enabled, if the main service is active and the device is locked, it will be settled the optimal value to be assigned to the multimedia volume based on perceived noise from the microphone.

It increases battery consumption.

In no case your personal data will be collected.
If this setting is enabled, when LockScreen\'s quick setting is clicked and activated, in addition to starting the main service, the device gets also locked.

If enabled, the main service undertakes, after the device wakes up (e.g after the keyguard is gone), to start the lockscreen offered by LockScreen.

If during this activity any action is taken to bypass it, the device will be locked again.

This service can also be managed via quick setting, which, if specified in settings, also provides to lock the device.

Please do not start it if you do not have perfect pitch, you may not be able to unlock your device in emergency situations!

If enabled, the main service undertakes, after the device wakes up (e.g after the keyguard is gone), to start the lockscreen offered by LockScreen.

If during this activity any action is taken to bypass it, the device will be locked again.

This service can also be managed via quick setting, which, if specified in settings, also provides to lock the device.

Please do not start it if you do not have perfect pitch, you may not be able to unlock your device in emergency situations!
